column1: And if we 're offering you your passage home, you and the children, and help in finding your feet once you get there, and a good convent school for the girls, so that they can go straight on with the nuns and won't really notice any difference, well, all that's to be regarded as a loan, which we 're very glad to offer you for an extended period, in the hopes of getting you back among caring people.
